chapters.title: Chapter 12: A Shard of a Moment
chapters.info: Edarra, p. 268—Wise One of the Nader sept of the Shiande Aiel. She has blue eyes and fair hair, and looks not much older than Perrin. She can channel, and is of moderately great strength. She went with Perrin to seek out Masema. She objected, quite strongly, to Perrin's decision to let the Seanchan capture Shaido Wise Ones as damane. She follows Perrin, not Rand.
